title: Cape Hatteras National Seashore: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Cape Hatteras National Seashore is open year-round, although facilities and programs do change throughout the year. Please check the follow list for times certain facilities and tours are available, and check the Calendar for a listing of current ranger program offerings.   Bodie Island     Bodie Island Visitor Center Year-round 9 am—5 pm    Christmas Day Closed   Bodie Island Lighthouse Climbing 3rd Friday in April—Columbus Day See page    Rest of the year no climbs   Oregon Inlet Campground 3rd Friday in April—Last weekend in November See page     Rest of the year Closed        Hatteras Island     Hatteras Island Visitor Center Year-round 9 am—5 pm     Christmas Day Closed   Museum of the Sea Mid-March—October 9 am—5 pm    Rest of the year Intermittent   Cape Hatteras Lighthouse Climbing 3rd Friday in April—Columbus Day See page    Rest of the year No climbs   Cape Point Campground 3rd Friday in April—Last weekend in November See page     Rest of the year Closed   Frisco Campground 3rd Friday in April—Last weekend in November See page     Rest of the year Closed        Ocracoke Island     Ocracoke Island Visitor Center Year-round 9 am—5 pm    Christmas Day Closed   Ocracoke Campground 3rd Friday in April—Last weekend in November See page     Rest of the year Closed
